input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Dell Inspiron 1750 17.3-Inch Obsidian Black Laptop - Up to 4 Hours 42 Minutes of Battery Life, MS Home and Student Software Included (Windows 7 Home Premium) [Discontinued By Manufacturer]

Item specifications:
2.1GHz Intel Pentium Dual Core T4300 Processor
4GB Memory
320GB Hard Drive, DVDR/RW Optical Drive
17.3" Display, Integrated Intel 4500 MHD Media Accelerator Graphics
Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit), *Up to 4 Hours 42 Minutes of Battery Life
input_text.Response A: This laptop will be your reliable, constant companion, with up to 4 hours of battery life and an Intel 4500 MHD Media Accelerator Graphics card for high-performance gaming and video. It comes with 4GB of memory and a 320GB hard drive for plenty of storage space. The 17.3" display is perfect for watching movies, playing games, or working on your next big project. This laptop comes with a genuine Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit) operating system, ensuring that you'll have a smooth and efficient experience. The Dell Inspiron 1750 is a great choice for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient laptop.
input_text.Response B:
Large view, small price. Escape in the new Inspiron17 laptop's spacious Hi-def 17.3-inch display, customizable features and desktop-level performance. *Based on Dell Lab testing. Battery life varies by configuration, operating conditions and other factors. Maximum battery capacity decreases with time and use.
Includes a 2.1GHz Intel Pentium Dual Core T4300 Processor, 17.3" Display, Integrated Intel 4500 MHD Media Accelerator Graphics, 4GB Memory, and more.
